content: mosaic christmas cal part 4 this is the fourth part of mosaic christmas cal hosted by mosaic crochet mals cals & more group on facebook designers from all over the world have joined this collaboration and we are happy to share these gorgeous patterns with you welcome to join us every part of this cal has been designed by different designers you will find other parts of this cal in the ravelry page of the designers not on my ravelry page you will find all information in the facebook group that hosts the cal this pattern contains a short description on how to read a chart the chart itself written row by row instructions and a link to a youtube video created by tania leis for this pattern
